title: S15 Ep57: Portrait of a Past Life Skeptic
itunes:title: Portrait of a Past Life Skeptic
description:
Today's show features the incredible reincarnation story of Detective Robert Snow & an equally remarkable sign of Angelic contact with famed author Ptolemy Thompkins & Officer Tyler Beddoes.

Two enlightening, heartwarming tales that will reaffirm our faith in the hereafter on a special encore presentation of Darkness Radio from February 26, 2016.

Get your awesome Paranormal needs met here: https://www.amazon.com/shop/darknessradiodave
